column1:
JS_Functions,Array Methods,"Using one of the array methods:
1.- Create the declared function ""getArray"" that takes the data passed as argument and returns a TRUE array out of it. The array will have more than 1 item.
2.- Print to the console the result of calling the getArray function when you pass these arguments: one, two, three, four.
3.- Print to the console the result of calling the getArray function when you pass this argument: transmission.
","function getArray(){
